meta_description: A day at the Tampa Bay History Center includes hands-on, interactive exhibits and theaters diving into 12,000 years of Florida history.
hours_text:
## Our locations tell Tampa Bay’s most fascinating stories.

[ Open Daily   
10 a.m.–5 p.m. **Along Tampa's Riverwalk**  
801 Water Street, Tampa, FL 33602  History Center Water Street ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/http://13509.blackbaudhosting.com/13509/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=33817993-6059-4743-829e-7362efe2b7f2) [ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/http://13509.blackbaudhosting.com/13509/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=33817993-6059-4743-829e-7362efe2b7f2 "Click here to purchase your tickets")

[ See schedule of talks & tours. **Encore Tampa**  
1213 N. Central Ave., Tampa, FL 33602  Tampa's Black History Museum Encore ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/tampas-black-history-museum/)

[ Weekend Tours  
10 a.m.–4 p.m. Located atop one of the highest points in Florida, Chinsegut Hill is home to a historic house situated in a 114-acre preserve.  Chinsegut Hill Brooksville ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/chinsegut/) [ ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/http://13509.blackbaudhosting.com/13509/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=6dd2913e-c047-4864-849b-db76daf5edf6 "Click here to purchase your tickets")

[ Open Daily   
at 11 a.m. The Cafe recreates the charm and flavor of the original Columbia Restaurant in Ybor City, and offers a sampling of the Spanish- and Cuban-inspired dishes that made the 116-year-old restaurant famous.  Columbia Cafe Tampa Riverwalk ](http://web.archive.org/web/...
admission_text:
## Take advantage of these pass programs.

[View all events](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/events/month/)

### Museums For All

### Library Passes

### Discounted Admission Days

Families presenting a Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) card, and a valid form of photo ID will receive free admission to the History Center for the cardholder plus three additional guests.

Visit your library's website and receive free admission to the History Center and other Tampa Bay area museums. Participating counties include [Hernando County](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://hernandocountylibrary.us/museumpasses/), [Hillsborough County,](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://hcplc.org/services/discoverypass) [Pasco County,](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://www.pascolibraries.org/borrow/museum/) and [Pinellas County.](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://pplc.us/museums/)

Discounted tickets for active military and veterans are available with ID at Visitor Services on the second floor. [Click here ](http://web.archive.org/web/20251116192008/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/blog/what-is-blue-star-museums-all-about/)for information about free admission through our Blue Star Museums program. 

### Museums For All

accessibility_text:
##  **Tampa Bay History Center is committed to accessibility**

Tampa Bay History Center strives to maintain a website that is both accessible to all visitors and compliant with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) put forth by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

We recognize that accessibility and usability are not always possible in every area of the website, or for those visitors using assistive technologies and devices. Tampa Bay History Center conducts accessibility reviews of its website and remediates issues uncovered by these audits. Please be aware that our efforts are ongoing.

## **Have feedback or need help?**

We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of Tampa Bay History Center. If you have specific questions or feedback about this site's accessibility or need assistance using specific features, please contact us via telephone at (813) 675-8992 or via email at . If you have found an inaccessible area on the site, please specify the web page or element and provide any other relevant information to help us locate the problem.

In the event a page cannot be made accessible, we will work to make a text version of the content available. Please contact us via telephone at (813) 675-8992 or via email at to request a specific electronic format. Please provide us with your contact information, the format you require, the web page address and the location of the content.

We welcome your questions about this accessibility statement and comments on how to ...
collections_text:
## Dig through  
our archives.

### Touchton Map Library

Navigate more than 8,000 maps, charts and logs from the early exploration of Europe and North America.

[Chart your course](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113054557/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/exhibit/touchton-map-library/)

### Witt Research Center

View nearly 10,000 books, manuals, maps, documents, microfilm, and family/subject papers spanning prehistoric to present-day Florida.

[About the Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20260113054557/https://tampabayhistorycenter.org/collections/)
